scripts.cpl-js: cd src && find . -iname "*.js" | while read f; do echo $f; d="`dirname $f`"; mkdir -p "../dist/$d"; cp $f "../dist/$d"; done
scripts.cpl-css: cd src && find . -iname "*.css" | while read f; do echo $f; d="`dirname $f`"; mkdir -p "../dist/$d"; cp $f "../dist/$d"; done
scripts.cpl-less: cd src && find . -iname "*.less" | while read f; do echo $f; d="`dirname $f`"; b="`basename $f`"; lessc $f > "../dist/$d/${b/less/css}"; done
scripts.do-kill: ps aux | grep node; killall -9 node; ps aux | grep node
scripts.do-less: for file in src/assets/less/*.less; do lessc $file "dist/assets/css/`basename ${file/.less/.css}`" ; done
scripts.prebuild: npm run do-less; npm run do-jade
scripts.preserver: npm run do-kill; npm run live-reload
